name: A Plumber for All Seasons
overview: A Plumber For All Seasons from Super Mario World. The premise is that each world represents a different season — there's a Spring world, a Summer world, a Fall world, and a Winter world (And some more!). What might set it apart from other hacks is that a lot of resources are made by the author - all the graphics, a bit of ASM, and even some music here and there. A Plumber For All Seasons features: • 37 levels with 41 exits. • Almost entirely custom graphics, all of them hand-made. • A focus on interesting, season-themed scenery and fun levels. • An original soundtrack by some of SMWC's finest musicians. • Rewards and easter eggs for completionists.
